dct_title_s: Map showing the localities of the principal mineral and vegetable products of India and the course of the trunk railways
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:8,750,000 (E 70째--E 100째/N 35째--N 5째) Relief shown by hachures. In right upper margin: Report--Colonization and settlement (India). In right lower margin: Number 326. Ordered by the House of Commons to be printed 10. June 1858. On cover: Ordered by the House of Commons, to be printed, 6 May 1858. At head of cover title: Colonization, &c. (India). Errata included.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
